question: Which place of Madhya Pradesh is called ‘Detroit of Madhya Pradesh’?
explanation: ‘Pithampur’ located in ‘Dhar’ district of Madhya Pradesh is called Detroit of Madhya Pradesh on account of large numbers of manufacturing industries loacted here.It has been also,declared as a Special Economic Zone (SEZ) of Pithampur in Madhya Pradesh.Chennai is called Detroit of India.
